snippet: President Obama’s 2012 convention in North Carolina will be weighed down by four years of politics, wars overseas and promises kept and broken.
abstract: Caucus column; Pres Obama and his supporters, gathering for the Democratic convention, will face a significant challenge in duplicating the optimism and energy that fueled his first convention in 2008.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s 2012 convention in North Carolina will be weighed down by four years of politics, wars overseas and promises kept and broken.

headline.seo: For Democrats, Convention Challenge Is to Repeat 2008
headline.main: With ’08 on Their Minds, Democrats Gather in Charlotte
headline.print_headline: Democrats’ Challenge In Charlotte: Repeat ’08 Denver Gathering
